title: Candy Crush Booster Guide
summary: The Candy Crush desktop app now runs on the shared game loop with pause, mute, and reset controls exposed through the overlay. Two boosters help clear stubborn boards without breaking the match-three pacing.

title: Captive Portal Detection Service
summary: The captive portal detector polls the same endpoints that major operating systems use to confirm unrestricted internet access. When one of the probes is intercepted, the service launches a sandboxed WebKit session so the sign-in flow cannot touch the user's primary browser profile.

title: Command palette search behaviour
summary: The desktop command palette is designed to be a fast way to jump between applications, open windows, documentation and static pages. The search runs in a dedicated web worker so the UI thread stays responsive even as the index grows.
